title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Oct. 10
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Oct. 10
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Carl Riccadonna\u0010Chief US Economist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Robotics, e-commerce seen as `uber-growth' areas." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
